Container.Name: TAK-Server-5.4-Automated-Setup
Container.Overview:
TAK Server 5.4 One-Click Automated Setup for Unraid
**SIMPLE AUTOMATED SETUP:** 1. Download TAK Server 5.4 ZIP from https://tak.gov/products/tak-server 2. Place the ZIP file in /mnt/user/appdata/tak-server 3. Start this container - completely automated setup begins 4. Monitor container logs for progress and generated credentials 5. Copy docker-compose.yml to setup directory and run: docker-compose up -d 6. Access TAK Server at https://YOUR-IP:8445
**FEATURES:** ✓ Bulletproof automated setup with comprehensive error handling ✓ Memory-optimized extraction process (solves Exit Code 137) ✓ Automatic JKS certificate generation (required for TAK 5.4) ✓ Network binding fixes for Docker compatibility ✓ Complete validation and secure credential generation ✓ Automatic Community Application mode detection
**AFTER SETUP:** This container prepares all TAK Server files, certificates, and configuration. After completion, copy the docker-compose.yml from the GitHub repository to the setup directory and run docker-compose up -d to deploy TAK Server.
Container.PostArgs: sh -c " echo 'TAK Server 5.4 Automated Setup Starting...' && apk add --no-cache bash git unzip zip openssl curl docker-compose docker-cli openjdk17-jre-headless && echo 'Downloading setup scripts...' && git clone https://github.com/Zeroradiance/tak-server-unraid.git /tmp/taksetup && cp -r /tmp/taksetup/scripts /setup/ && cp /tmp/taksetup/CoreConfig.xml /setup/ && cp /tmp/taksetup/docker-compose.yml /setup/ && cd /setup && if [ -f takserver-docker-*.zip ]; then echo 'Extracting TAK Server files (memory-optimized)...' && unzip -q takserver-docker-*.zip && cp -r takserver-docker-*/* . && rm -rf takserver-docker-*/ && echo 'Files extracted successfully' fi && chmod +x scripts/setup-unraid-complete.sh && bash scripts/setup-unraid-complete.sh "
